definition: to close by coming together (like the lips of a wound, the doors of an elevator, the walls of a channel)/to close by connecting in a loop (like a circuit)/closed-loop
to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Breathe out through pursed lips as if you were whistling.
sentences.chinese: 從閉合嘴脣中呼氣，就好像在吹口哨。

sentences.english: The racquet face is a bit closed, so she'll generate some topspin.
sentences.chinese: 她現在的拍面是閉合的，因此她就可以加上點上旋。

sentences.english: Behindher, the first gate closed, trapping them like a ship in a lock.
sentences.chinese: 第一個門緩緩地合上了，就像一道閉合的船閘。

sentences.english: Hold the fingers straight and then close them against the thumb.
sentences.chinese: 將四隻手指豎直併攏並向大拇指方向閉合即可。

sentences.english: Inside the plastic clip are pieces of metal that close a circuit when the jumper is in place.
sentences.chinese: 塑料夾套內部是金屬線，當跳線就位時可以閉合電路。

sentences.english: Ray shielding can play a role when Xray room is completely closed.
sentences.chinese: 光室必須完全閉合才能起到屏蔽射線的作用。

sentences.english: The hinges are self-closing the last few centimetres, leaving the door fully closed.
sentences.chinese: 合頁在最後的幾釐米自動關閉，使門完全閉合。

sentences.english: Adjustable hook-and-loop closure strap keeps shoes secure.
sentences.chinese: 可調的鉤環閉合揹帶保持鞋的安全。
這就構成了一個閉合電路。

sentences.english: The contact that closes when the coil is energized is called normally open.
sentences.chinese: 當線圈充電時觸點閉合，稱爲常開觸點。

sentences.english: Relay which uses the electromagnetic field of a coil to attract an armature and close the contact points.
sentences.chinese: 利用吸引線圈產生磁場，吸引銜鐵並閉合觸點。

sentences.english: Hook-and-loop closure for a customizable fit.
sentences.chinese: 一個可定製的適合的鉤環閉合。

sentences.english: Ensure that the pack is properly resealed to prevent wipes drying out.
sentences.chinese: 確保包裝封口閉合，防止淨膚棉脫水變幹。

sentences.english: The full extent of the form is visible when the lid is closed.
sentences.chinese: 當蓋被閉合時，能看到形體的整個範圍。

sentences.english: Main deck E. R. entrance door port-door closer missing.
sentences.chinese: 主甲板機艙左舷入口門沒有閉合器。

sentences.english: Receptiveness was regarded as the time between flower opening and closure.
sentences.chinese: 自花朵開放到閉合的時間被看成是可受期。

definition: to squeeze out/to extrude/to drain/to find the time/to burst out
wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
